title: Filter function: open
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Directory page
AND filter field has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks anywhere on the filter field
custom_expected:
THEN dropdown menu appears
AND it looks like the photo below
AND it has a scroll bar
AND top item reads: All departments

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19847)

title: View More button
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on the Global Directory page
custom_expected:
THEN a button labeled View More is at the bottom of the page

AND WHEN user clicks the button
THEN 8 more contact cards appear.

title: Filter function: click or tap
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on Global Directory page
AND user has clicked or tapped on Filter dropdown box
AND dropdown menu has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on any menu item (except All Departments)
custom_expected:
THEN Filter dropdown menu disappears
AND Filter dropdown box shows the selected department name
AND grid of contact boxes disappears
AND a new grid of contact boxes appears
AND all employees in the new grid are in the department that was selected
AND no employee from another department appears in the new grid

title: Contact function: select email address
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Directory page
AND user has flipped a contact card
AND email address is visible
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on email address
custom_expected:
THEN 2 new windows open
AND the new window in the back has the user's linked email program inbox
AND the new window in the front has a draft email
AND the To: field in the draft email contains the email address that was selected
AND the cursor is flashing in the Subject: field

title: Filter function: close
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Directory page
AND user has clicked or tapped on the Filter dropdown box
AND the dropdown menu has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks anywhere on the page (except on the dropdown menu)
custom_expected:
THEN dropdown box automatically closes
AND dropdown menu disappears

title: Filter function: click or tap All Departments
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on Global Directory page
AND user has clicked on Filter dropdown box
AND user has clicked on an item in the Filter dropdown menu
AND grid of contact boxes has changed to show only employees in the selected department
AND dropdown menu has disappeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on the Filter dropdown box
AND dropdown menu appears
AND user clicks on the item All Departments
custom_expected:
THEN dropdown menu disappears
AND grid of contact boxes disappears
AND new grid of contact boxes appears
AND the new grid includes all MLB employees
AND dropdown menu disappears
AND dropdown box shows the All Departments item

title: Filter scroll function: manual
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on Global Directory page
AND user has clicked or tapped on Filter dropdown box
AND dropdown menu has appeared
AND dropdown menu has scroll bar
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks and holds or presses on the scroll bar
AND user moves up or down
custom_expected:
THEN scroll bar moves up or down accordingly
AND dropdown menu moves up or down accordingly

title: Filter scroll function: automatic
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on Global Directory page
AND user has clicked or tapped on Filter dropdown box
AND dropdown menu has appeared
AND dropdown menu has a scroll bar
custom_steps:
WHEN user uses scroll function on mouse
OR user uses arrow keys on keyboard
custom_expected:
THEN dropdown menu moves up or down accordingly
AND scroll bar automatically moves up or down in sync with menu navigation

title: Contact card flips
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on Global Directory page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on a contact card arrow
custom_expected:
THEN the card flips to show the back
AND the back looks like the photo below
AND clicking the arrow on the back flips the card again.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19845)

title: OBSOLETE - Directory function: select contact
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Directory page
AND contact boxes have appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on a contact's name
OR user clicks on a contact's image
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects in the same tab
AND the new page is the individual contact page corresponding to the name that was clicked upon

title: OBSOLETE - Contact breadcrumb click or tap
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an individual contact page
AND breadcrumb has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the breadcrumb Directory red label
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects in the same tab to the Global Directory page
AND grid of contact boxes appears
AND the contacts are all the MLB employees

title: OBSOLETE - Search function: click or tap
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Directory page
AND Search field has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps inside Search field
custom_expected:
THEN a flashing vertical line appears in the field
AND the line is to the left of and touching the S in Search

title: OBSOLETE - Search function: type and enter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on Global Directory page
AND Search field has appeared
AND user has clicked or tapped inside the Search field
custom_steps:
WHEN user types whole words
OR user types partial words
AND hits Return/Go/Enter
custom_expected:
THEN contacts on the page are replaced by the relevant contacts
AND the contacts are relevant because their first or last name contains the sequence of characters typed into the Search field
AND the characters remain in the Search field

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19068)

title: OBSOLETE - Search function: no result
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Directory page
AND the Search field has appeared
AND the user has clicked or tapped within the Search field
custom_steps: WHEN user types characters that no contact matches
custom_expected:
THEN all contact boxes disappear
AND below the dropdown box a dark blue message appears that reads: No members found
AND the message is horizontally centered
AND the white box shrinks so there is no big blank space

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19069)

title: OBSOLETE - Contact breadcrumb hover
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an individual contact page
AND breadcrumb has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user hovers cursor over red label
custom_expected: THEN cursor changes from arrow to pointing hand

title: OBSOLETE - Contact breadcrumb hover - no result
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on an individual contact page
AND breadcrumb has appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user hovers cursor over the carat
OR user hovers cursor over the blue label
custom_expected: THEN the cursor does not change from the arrow -- those 2 elements are not linked.

title: OBSOLETE - Contact breadcrumb - line break
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 341px
AND user is on an individual contact page
AND breadcrumb has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN breadcrumb is split on 2 lines
AND the carat is on the 2nd line, not the first line
AND the 2 lines are left aligned

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19076)

title: OBSOLETE - Directory function: search for BOC
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on the Global Directory page
custom_steps:
WHEN user types Manfred into the Search field
AND user hits Enter/Go/Return
custom_expected:
THEN contact box for Rob Manfred appears

title: Contact box appearance at or above 768px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 768px
AND user is on Global Directory page
AND contacts have appeared
custom_expected:
THEN each contact box is gray with a white border
AND each contact box has up to 8 elements: image, name, title, department, number label, number, email label, email address
AND the image is on the left side of the contact box
AND the image has its own gray border
AND the image's right border is the contact box's left border
AND the image is proportionate (not stretched or squeezed)
AND the name is dark blue, bold faced, underlined, and initial capped
And the title is gray and initial capped
AND the department is dark blue in a white box with a dark blue border
AND the number label is dark blue and initial capped and reads: Office Number: (with colon)
AND there is a space between the number label and the number
AND the number is dark blue and formatted: (xxx) xxx-xxxx [fix is in progress to make this happen]
AND there is a space between the ) and the next number
AND there is no space on either side of the dash
AND the email label is dark blue and initial capped and reads: Office Email: (with colon)
AND there is a space between the email label and the email address
AND the email address is red and underlined
AND the email address is an mlb.com address
AND the email address does not have capital letters
AND the name, title, department box, number label, and email label are all left aligned

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19624)

title: Contact without address: appearance at or above 992px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 992px
AND user is on an individual contact page
AND there is no address

Example: Gary Green
custom_expected:
THEN a white box has appeared
AND above the white box is header that reads: Members
AND the header is dark blue and all caps
AND the header is left aligned with the left border of the white box
AND at the top of the white box is a breadcrumb
AND the breadcrumb is in all caps
AND the breadcrumb has 3 elements: a red label, a right-facing carat, and a dark blue label
AND the red label is underlined and reads: Directory
AND the blue label is the same name as the contact's name
AND below the breadcrumb is an image with a gray border
AND the breadcrumb is left aligned with the left border of the image
AND to the right of the image is a Name header
AND the Name header is dark blue and initial capped
AND below the Name header are 2 columns
AND the Name header is left aligned with the left column
AND the left column has 4 dark blue bold-face labels (with 4 colons): Job Title:, Department:, Phone:, Email:
AND the left column labels are left aligned
AND the right column can have up to 4 items: title, department name, phone number, email address
AND the right column items are left aligned
AND the title, department name, and phone number are dark blue
AND the email address is red
AND the phone number is formatted (xxx) xxx-xxxx
AND no element on the page overlaps with any other

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19628)

title: Contact with address: appearance at or above 992px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 992px
AND user is on an individual contact page
AND there is an address
custom_expected:
THEN contact elements look like the description in test case "Contact without address - appearance at or above 992px"
AND the left column includes a 5th label (with colon): Address:
AND the right column includes another item
AND that item has 4 lines: street address, city, state, 5-digit zip code
AND the 4 lines are left aligned
AND the state name is not abbreviated

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19626)

title: Contact without address: appearance at or below 991px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 991px
AND user is on an individual contact page
AND there is no address
custom_expected:
THEN a white box has appeared
AND above the white box is header that reads: Members
AND the header is dark blue and all caps
AND the header is left aligned with the left border of the white box
AND all elements inside the white box are left aligned
AND at the top of the white box is a breadcrumb
AND the breadcrumb is in all caps
AND the breadcrumb has 3 elements: a red label, a right-facing carat, and a dark blue label
AND the red label is underlined and reads: Directory
AND the blue label is the same name as the contact's name
AND below the breadcrumb is an image with a gray border
AND below the image is a Name header
AND the Name header is dark blue and initial capped
AND below the Name header are 4 dark blue bold-face labels (with 4 colons): Job Title:, Department:, Phone:, Email:
AND each label can have an item: title, department name, phone number, email address
AND the title, department name, and phone number are dark blue
AND the email address is red
AND the phone number is formatted (xxx) xxx-xxxx
AND no element on the page overlaps with any other


![](index.php?/attachments/get/19629)

title: Contact with address: appearance at or below 991px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 991px
AND user is on an individual contact page
AND there is an address
custom_expected:
THEN elements on the page look like the description in test case "Contact without address - appearance at or below 991px"
AND below the email address is another label (with colon): Address:
AND below the Address label are 4 lines: street address, city, state, 5-digit zip code
AND the 4 lines are left aligned
AND the state name is not abbreviated

title: Contact name fonts
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on the Global Directory page
custom_steps:
WHEN user searches for Yuko Bessett
AND user searches for Gary Greene
custom_expected:
THEN both names appear in upper case/lower case (NOT all upper or all lower)

title: Directory appearance at or below 991px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 991px
AND user is on the Global Directory page
AND user is on the first page of the Directory
custom_expected:
THEN page has a white box
AND above the white box is a dark blue, all-caps header that reads: Members
AND the header is left aligned with the left border of the white box
AND inside the box at the top is a Search field
AND inside the Search field is a gray magnifying glass icon and a gray label that reads: Search
AND no elements of the Search field overlap each other
AND below the Search field is the Filter dropdown box
AND the dropdown box has a black boldface all-caps label that reads: All Departments
AND below the dropdown box is are contact boxes
AND the left borders of the Search field, the dropdown box, and the contact boxes all align
AND the right borders of the Search field, the dropdown box, and the contact boxes all align
AND 10 contact boxes appear stacked on the page
AND below the contact boxes, horizontally centered, is dark blue pagination: 1- 10 of x (where x is the total contacts)
AND there is a space between the hyphen and the 10
AND below the pagination, horizontally centered, are white boxes with gray borders and red numbers inside
AND a white box with a red label that reads: Next
AND a white box with a red label that reads: Last
AND the boxes are top and bottom aligned with each other
AND the box marked 1 has a dark blue background
AND in that box the number 1 is white
AND no element on the page overlaps another


![](index.php?/attachments/get/19065)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19064)

title: Directory function: hover
custom_preconds:

AND contact boxes have appeared

OR user hovers cursor over contact's name
OR user hovers cursor over contact's email address
custom_expected: THEN cursor changes from arrow to pointing hand

title: Directory function: hover - no result

AND contact boxes have appeared

custom_expected: THEN cursor does not change from the arrow -- only those 3 elements are linked

title: Test responsiveness - no gaps in grid
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a desktop platform
custom_steps:
WHEN user decreases the viewport
AND WHEN user expands the viewport
custom_expected:
THEN all elements continue to appear on the page
AND no elements overlap any other in any viewport
AND images stay proportionate (not stretched or squished)
AND all elements function as expected.

Note: In Windows IE and Edge, Chatter images will be stretched.

title: Test mobile
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is using a mobile device
custom_expected:
THEN all elements appear on the page
AND no elements overlap any other
AND all elements function as expected
